name: Housing loan programs; general powers
text:
(a)  The corporation may make, enter into, and enforce all contracts or agreements which are necessary, convenient, or desirable for the purposes of the performance of its duties in executing the housing loan programs.
	(b)  The corporation may require representations and warranties as it determines necessary to secure its loans. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2]

	(b)  The administration may require representations and warranties as it determines necessary to secure its loans. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2; am L 2005, c 196, §26(a)]
